algorithm_technique: Monotonic stack to find the next smaller element
problem_summary_simple: Find the next smaller price to the right for each item and apply a discount.
problem_summary_technical: Use a monotonic stack to efficiently find the next smaller element for each price in the array.
key_insights: The problem asks for the 'next smaller element' to the right for each element.
A monotonic increasing stack is a standard and efficient data structure for this type of problem.
When a smaller element is encountered, it can be used to discount all larger elements currently on the stack.
